file_insights.purpose: End-to-end testing guide for configuration management functionality
key_sections: 6 detailed test flows covering navigation, API key management, service settings, persistence, key masking, and workspace settings
file_insights.test_coverage: Comprehensive - covers happy path, validation errors, edge cases, empty states, loading states, responsive design

patterns_discovered.description: Each test flow follows consistent structure: Objective → Steps → Expected Results → Common Issues
patterns_discovered.significance: Ensures systematic and reproducible testing approach

patterns_discovered.description: Configuration page uses tabbed interface with three tabs: API Keys, Services, Workspace
patterns_discovered.significance: Separates concerns and provides clear navigation structure for users

patterns_discovered.description: Forms include required field validation, number range validation, email format validation with specific error messages
patterns_discovered.significance: Ensures data integrity and good user experience with clear feedback

patterns_discovered.description: Implementation includes loading states, success messages, error alerts, copy confirmations, and deletion confirmations
patterns_discovered.significance: Provides clear visual feedback for all user actions

patterns_discovered.description: Keys are masked (sk-••••••••••••••••) in UI, full value copied to clipboard, confirmation dialogs for deletion
patterns_discovered.significance: Protects sensitive credentials while maintaining functionality

patterns_discovered.description: Three services (TikTok, Blog Engine, Email) with unique field requirements and validation rules
patterns_discovered.significance: Demonstrates flexibility of configuration system for different service types

patterns_discovered.description: Documented empty state displays for API keys with clear call-to-action buttons
patterns_discovered.significance: Improves user experience for new/empty configurations

patterns_discovered.description: Testing includes mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1920px) viewports

gotchas_discovered.description: Add API Key button currently shows alert dialog instead of full implementation. Noted as 'will be implemented in a future subtask'
gotchas_discovered.impact: Users cannot actually add new keys yet; core functionality is partially stubbed

gotchas_discovered.description: Configuration explicitly noted to save to in-memory storage (Map) rather than persistent database
gotchas_discovered.impact: Data is not persisted across sessions; only suitable for development/testing

gotchas_discovered.description: Loading state testing requires temporarily modifying component props (setting isLoading={true})
gotchas_discovered.impact: Cannot fully test loading states without code changes; suggests need for state management testing utilities

gotchas_discovered.description: All API keys and configuration values are example/mock data (sk-test-*, test values)
gotchas_discovered.impact: Not suitable for production use; actual API integration needed

gotchas_discovered.description: Success message auto-dismisses after 3 seconds, timing must be verified
gotchas_discovered.impact: Users need sufficient time to read the message; timing should be validated with real users

gotchas_discovered.description: Validation errors remain visible until field is corrected, but behavior on partial form changes not fully detailed
gotchas_discovered.impact: Need to verify error clearing happens correctly when user corrects individual fields

approach_outcome.approach: Created comprehensive end-to-end testing guide with detailed test flows, validation scenarios, UI verification steps, and acceptance criteria
key_achievements: Documented 6 complete test flows covering all major configuration features
Included step-by-step verification procedures with checkmarks for clarity
Covered validation testing, edge cases, and error scenarios
Included troubleshooting guide for common issues
Covered responsive design testing across multiple viewports
approach_outcome.implementation_completeness: 95% - Core configuration management features documented; placeholder for add API key dialog noted for future implementation

recommendations.recommendation: Implement actual Add API Key dialog functionality to replace the placeholder alert
recommendations.reason: Users currently cannot add new API keys; this is essential for the feature to be production-ready

recommendations.recommendation: Replace in-memory Map storage with persistent database (likely Clerk/database integration)
recommendations.reason: Current implementation loses all configuration on page refresh, unsuitable for production

recommendations.recommendation: Create automated test suite based on this verification guide using Playwright or Cypress
recommendations.reason: Manual testing procedures documented; automation would provide regression testing and faster validation

recommendations.recommendation: Add tests for form state management, particularly error clearing and field interactions
recommendations.reason: Validation behavior on partial corrections not explicitly verified in current documentation

recommendations.recommendation: Verify 3-second auto-dismiss timing for success messages with user testing
recommendations.reason: Timing may be too quick for some users to read; consider adjustable or user-controlled dismissal

recommendations.recommendation: Add performance baselines for configuration save operations
recommendations.reason: Performance expectations section created but specific latency targets not defined

recommendations.recommendation: Document API key encryption and transmission security in a separate security guide
recommendations.reason: Current guide covers masking/UI security; backend security procedures should be documented

recommendations.recommendation: Create component testing utilities to enable simpler testing of loading states
recommendations.reason: Currently requires temporary prop modifications; reusable test utilities would improve developer workflow
